channel.title: Batman
channel.description:
After watching the movies, I played Arkham Asylum. Awesome Stuff. Probably going to start on Arkham City tonight. I much prefer the comic book style and plot (from what little I know of it) as opposed to the movies.
Thing is, there are so many years worth of Batman comics out there I don't know where to begin. Hopefully not at the first issue.
So, to gain a full understanding of the Batman storyline and lore, what should I read? Where do I begin? In what order?
Are there multiple story arcs and alternate stories?
I am quite lost...

item.title: Batman
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
There are really only two Batmen in my opinion:

Adam West and Michael Keaton. Michael Keaton was good in the new “gritty” version of Batman but I much prefer the Adam West campy Batman.

Sorry, but this is Batman, in my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: Batman
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
xalener:

Batman Beyond was amazing, you dicknut.

It was, but from what I took from his post was that it didn’t add to Bruce’s backstory. It added to his futurestory.

item.title: Batman
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
MDIGN:

Just watch the Justice League and one of the cartoon series. That is all.
As long as it’s not Batman Beyond you’re good.

Batman Beyond was amazing, you dicknut.

item.title: Batman
item.dc:creator: Navitas
item.description:
Note to self: Do not teach son and daughter how to fight and/or bathe them in radiation.

Thanks for the recommendations, I guess I’ll start with the major ones.

Read full topic

item.title: Batman
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Batman: Parents killed by mugger.
Superman: Parents killed by exploding planet.
Spiderman: Parents killed arch-villain

The life of superheroes…harsh for the parents.

Read full topic

item.title: Batman
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
Batman is best super hero. While I agree that Batman isn’t worth gaining a full understanding of, if there was a superhero worth gaining a full understanding of, it would be Batman.

Read full topic
